data.name: Additional Ymir Costume: Shrine Maiden Outfit
data.detailed_description:
A new costume for Ymir is added.
A shrine maiden costume for Ymir. Enjoy battles and daily life sections in new fashion.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Ymir.
Change into the costume "Shrine Maiden Outfit" by selecting "Character Editor" when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Ymir in the Daily Life section.
Change into the costume "Shrine Maiden Outfit" by selecting "Change outfit" when you are near Ymir.

fullgame.name: Attack on Titan 2 - A.O.T.2 - 進撃の巨人２

data.supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 VRAM 1GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo 48kHzWAVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3770 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 VRAM 2GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch surround 48KHzWAVE
